item.trackwork-fabric.track_tool_kit.too: Makes the track suspension _less bouncy_, but could do worse on rough terrain! _Sneak_ to make it less stiff.
_Move wheels_ back and forth depending on where you click.
When the stiffness gauge is used,
When the power wrench is used,
Multiple tools for working with tracks, packed into one convenient kit!
death.attack.trackwork-fabric.run_over.p: %1$s was thrown under the bus by %2$s
trackwork-fabric.ponder.tracks.text_1: Disclaimer: Tracks only work on assembled VS2 ships!
trackwork-fabric.ponder.tracks.text_3: tracks are built in a row.
trackwork-fabric.ponder.tracks.text_4: Tracks are powered via connected sprockets.
trackwork-fabric.ponder.wheels.text_1: Disclaimer: Wheels only work on assembled VS2 ships!
trackwork-fabric.ponder.wheels.text_2: Wheels are placed like, well, wheels
trackwork-fabric.ponder.wheels.text_3: Drive the wheels via the inner side,
trackwork-fabric.ponder.wheels.text_4: Or don't connect them, which lets the wheel spin freely.
trackwork-fabric.ponder.wheels.text_5: Power a wheel with redstone to steer it,
trackwork-fabric.ponder.wheels.text_6: and the opposite side will automatically follow.
